about_the_game:
Dunes Of Raeth is a single-player, sci-fi narrative set in the war-torn desert planet of Raeth.

You play as the King of Raeth. You are on your way to save one of your sons as your transport crashes in the Desert. In the ruthless dunes of your home-planet, you are surprised to discover a whole city...a whole civilization living in the middle of the desert.

As you learn more about the city, you realize that there are mystical forces at play here. The spirit of the planet itself has demanded an audience with you. After centuries of war and drought, you have the power to make a change.

Discover the mysteries behind the mystical energy that sustains your world, and make your way back to your throne. Your family needs you, your planet needs you!

Includes

  • A beautiful, stylized, immersive world

  • A story that adapts to your choices and evolves with you

  • Mysteries to solve

  • Over 36 different endings to experience

-Developed by Kalempirion Studios 13 -

-Solo-Dev : The DAC-

-Music by : Coraldi-

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains depictions of violent topics such as war, slavery or suicide. Based on the decisions you make in the game, you may allow or prevent some of the aforementioned behaviours.

detailed_description:
Dunes Of Raeth is a single-player, sci-fi narrative set in the war-torn desert planet of Raeth.

You play as the King of Raeth. You are on your way to save one of your sons as your transport crashes in the Desert. In the ruthless dunes of your home-planet, you are surprised to discover a whole city...a whole civilization living in the middle of the desert.

As you learn more about the city, you realize that there are mystical forces at play here. The spirit of the planet itself has demanded an audience with you. After centuries of war and drought, you have the power to make a change.

Discover the mysteries behind the mystical energy that sustains your world, and make your way back to your throne. Your family needs you, your planet needs you!

name: Dunes Of Raeth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 (4 * 3400), AMD Ryzen 5 1500X (4 * 3500) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4096 MB), Radeon RX 570 (8192 MB)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700 (8 * 2900), AMD Ryzen 7 3700X (8 * 3600) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 2060 Super (6144 MB), Radeon RX 5700 (8192 MB)

short_description: Dunes Of Raeth is a first-person adventure game set on the war-torn desert planet of Raeth. You play as the King of Raeth, facing the consequences of your rule, deciding the future of your loved ones and of the planet itself.
